content: below shows the back of the wreath designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items spider make 3 with black body round 1 in magic_ring 6sc 6 2 *increase* 6 times 12 3 *increase increase single_crochet* 4 times 20 4 single_crochet in each st 5 *single_crochet single_crochet chain 6 starting in 2nd chain from hook 5 slip_stitch single_crochet in next st 4 times single_crochet* twice 6 push the legs to the front and work behind them for this round in blo *decrease* 10 times 10 stuff with fiber fill 7 *decrease* 5 times fasten_off leaving tail to cinch hole closed head slip_stitch between the sets of legs at round 4 chain 3 5tc-bob 5tc-decrease slip_stitch to round 5 right below your initial slip_stitch fasten_off weave in ends assembly sew two spiders to tip of dangly web bits sew one spider to top right of web inside the ring candy twist with purple and light green the body is worked with all single_crochet and alternating colors 3p 3g means work 3 single_crochet in purple and 3 single_crochet in green designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items body round 1 in magic_ring 3p 3g 6 2 in blo *incg* 3 times *incp* 3 times 12 3 *p incp* 3 times *g incg* 3 times 18 4 *2 g incg* 3 times *2 p incp* 3 times 24 5 12p 12g 6 12g 12p 7 12p 12g 8 12g 12p 9 *2 p decp* 3 times *2 g decg* 3 times 18 10 *g decg* 3 times *p decp* 3 times 12 place 15mm eye between r6 & r7 stuff with fiber fill 11 *decp* 3 times *decg* 3 times fasten_off leaving tail to cinch when cinching only go through blo so that you can use the flo for the next step with white embroider around the top of the eye and a smile with fangs below it end ties with purple join in either the remaining flo of r1 or r11 you will work both ends round 1 2hdc in each st join chain 1 12 r2 double_crochet chain 3 slip_stitch in 3rd chain from hook double_crochet in each st join fasten_off 24dc 12picots fold work into itself see image below with green chain 8 wrap around base of tie slip_stitch to first chain fasten_off weave in ends assembly sew candy twist up on an angle seated on the ring designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items candy corn with white round 1 in magic_ring 4 single_crochet 4 2 *single_crochet increase* 2 times 6 3 *single_crochet increase* 3 times 9 4 single_crochet in each st 5 *2 single_crochet increase* 3 times 12 with bright orange 6 single_crochet in each st 7 *3 single_crochet increase* 3 times 15 8 single_crochet in each st 9 *4 single_crochet increase* 3 times 18 with bright yellow 10 single_crochet in each st 11 *5 single_crochet increase*3 times 21 12 single_crochet in each st 13 *6sc increase*
